name: Mantis Hat - Mesh Snapback / Patch / White Front, Black Mesh
description:
Get Fresh Summer Mesh 
Premium Canvas panel front 
Snapbacks Fit everyone !

Super clean style. This is the best fitting, best looking hat. 
This premium Classic deep fit flat visor is a step above the other mesh hats you'll find.
The high quality cotton twill keeps you cool in summer.

 - Premium Cotton Canvas
5 panel flat bill trucker !    
no foam

47% cotton
25% polyester
28% nylon

ONE SIZE FIT EVERYONE

Mantis United

name: PROTON -  Recon Black/Gold Coast (Gold Mirror on grey lens)
description:
Command respect & destroy the competition with the full shield PROTON.  Larger than life the Proton rules the throwback style with authority.  
Not like other retros- Proton offers premium vision protection. 
Don't waste your eyes or your time with inferior lenses.
Switch to the truly hi-def Cision lens.
Mirror from the future! Gold Coast sunglasses.

Hard Nylon case included
Logo etched lens, 3barrel hinge, All Sex, ultralight
Med-Large fit   
Lifetime warranty on craftsmanship
Exceeds U.S.& European ANSI Standards
UVA/UVB400 100% UV protection
Not for the timid, Now with chick magnetism!
Mantis - Made in Italy
